headline: Berkshire Hathaway Shifts As Buffett Exits And Abel Faces New Tests
summary: Warren Buffett is retiring as CEO of Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE:BRK.B), with Greg Abel set to succeed him. Berkshire has adjusted its equity portfolio, selling holdings in Apple, Bank of America, and Amazon.com. The company has added to positions in Chevron and Chubb and opened a new stake in The New York Times Company. A Berkshire utility subsidiary has agreed to a substantial settlement to resolve federal wildfire damage claims. Berkshire is also selling certain assets to support balance...

content.title: Berkshire Hathaway Shifts As Buffett Exits And Abel Faces New Tests

headline: Omdia: Xiaomi Reclaims Wearable Band Crown for the First Time Since 2020
summary: LONDON, February 27, 2026--Global wearable device shipments climbed past 200 million units in 2025, growing 6% year on year according to Omdia. Xiaomi has reclaimed the top spot for the first time since 2020, capturing an 18% market share to become the world’s largest wearable vendor by annual shipments. Apple followed closely in second place with 17%, while Huawei secured third with 16%. The market is also seeing increased consolidation, with the top five vendors, including Samsung (9%) and Gar

content.title: Omdia: Xiaomi Reclaims Wearable Band Crown for the First Time Since 2020
content.summary: LONDON, February 27, 2026--Global wearable device shipments climbed past 200 million units in 2025, growing 6% year on year according to Omdia. Xiaomi has reclaimed the top spot for the first time since 2020, capturing an 18% market share to become the world’s largest wearable vendor by annual shipments. Apple followed closely in second place with 17%, while Huawei secured third with 16%. The market is also seeing increased consolidation, with the top five vendors, including Samsung (9%) and Gar

headline: A look at Warren Buffett's final moves as Berkshire CEO
summary: Berkshire Hathaway (BRK-B, BRK-A) will release fourth quarter earnings results on Saturday. Berkshire's new CEO, Greg Abel, is set to deliver his first shareholder letter as chief executive on the same day, officially ringing in the company's post-Buffett era.  Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman takes a look at the moves Warren Buffett made in his final quarter as Berkshire Hathaway CEO. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

content.title: A look at Warren Buffett's final moves as Berkshire CEO
content.description:
Berkshire Hathaway (BRK-B, BRK-A) will release fourth quarter earnings results on Saturday. Berkshire's new CEO, Greg Abel, is set to deliver his first shareholder letter as chief executive on the same day, officially ringing in the company's post-Buffett era. 

Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman takes a look at the moves Warren Buffett made in his final quarter as Berkshire Hathaway CEO.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.
content.summary: Berkshire Hathaway (BRK-B, BRK-A) will release fourth quarter earnings results on Saturday. Berkshire's new CEO, Greg Abel, is set to deliver his first shareholder letter as chief executive on the same day, officially ringing in the company's post-Buffett era.  Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman takes a look at the moves Warren Buffett made in his final quarter as Berkshire Hathaway CEO. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.
